scripts.publish:ecies-lib: npx nx build digitaldefiance-ecies-lib --skip-nx-cache && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ dist/packages/digitaldefiance-ecies-lib --access public
scripts.publish:i18n-lib: npx nx build digitaldefiance-i18n-lib --skip-nx-cache && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ dist/packages/digitaldefiance-i18n-lib --access public
scripts.publish:node-ecies-lib: npx nx build digitaldefiance-node-ecies-lib --skip-nx-cache && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ dist/packages/digitaldefiance-node-ecies-lib --access public
scripts.publish:suite-core-lib: npx nx build digitaldefiance-suite-core-lib --skip-nx-cache && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ dist/packages/digitaldefiance-suite-core-lib --access public
scripts.publish:node-express-suite: npx nx build digitaldefiance-node-express-suite --skip-nx-cache && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ dist/packages/digitaldefiance-node-express-suite --access public
scripts.publish:express-suite-test-utils: npx nx build digitaldefiance-express-suite-test-utils --skip-nx-cache && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ dist/packages/digitaldefiance-express-suite-test-utils --access public
scripts.publish:express-suite-react-components: npx nx build digitaldefiance-express-suite-react-components --skip-nx-cache && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ dist/packages/digitaldefiance-express-suite-react-components --access public
scripts.publish:express-suite-starter: cd packages/digitaldefiance-express-suite-starter && yarn build && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
